author: jd5775
title: Often overlooked
review:
I always forget that I have this set in my collection and it really is a great set.  Although there is not much to say about it due to a relatively small amount of pieces, its a great extra vehicle to have in your town.

Pros:
-Basic yet detailed truck (a staple of lego 4 studs)
-Good accessories and minifig
-Brings uniqueness to your lego town

Cons:
-Really none

Overall this is  often overlooked because it's an "under $10 set" however it has some great features.  Sure to bring pothole patching joy to your town.

author: M_A_Melo
title: A good addition to any LEGO city.
review:
One of the first trucks of the 90's. This set has a very good design.
I can say the build is easy, yet its a very detailed truck.
Also at the time, it had a really good price value for a set like this.
Very playable indeed!
